title: Parkinson a Captain of the Maroons- development

content.question: The image depicts which of the following developments?

choices.label: Maroon communities consisting of formerly enslaved and free-born Africans formed around the Americas and Caribbean.
Maroon communities within southern plantations helped enslaved Africans maintain traditions and cultural practices.
Maroon communities in northern United States cities allowed African Americans to create institutions.
Maroon communities became wealthy from trading goods and captives taken from interior states.

content.answer: Maroon communities consisting of formerly enslaved and free-born Africans formed around the Americas and Caribbean.

topic.text: 2.15: Maroon Societies and Autonomous Black Communities

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
